title: Advanced Biology Quiz
description: Welcome to the advanced biology quiz. Test your knowledge with these challenging questions!

questions.text: Which organelle is known as the powerhouse of the cell?
What is the main component of plant cell walls?
Which process is responsible for the conversion of genetic information from DNA to mRNA?
What type of macromolecule are enzymes?
Which of the following is a purine base found in DNA?
What is the term for programmed cell death?
Which hormone regulates the amount of glucose in the blood?
What is the primary function of the large intestine?
Which structure in the human brain is responsible for regulating homeostasis?
What is the name of the process by which green plants produce their own food?
